title: The Reluctant Revolutionaries
description: Hilarious historical adventures of kids who accidentally stumble into history's greatest moments. They didn't ask to be heroes - history just keeps happening to them!

stories.title: Liberty or Lunchtime: The Accidental Adventures of Theo Finch
stories.description: 9-year-old Theo just wants to go home and eat pie. Instead, he keeps accidentally becoming a hero of the American Revolution. Features: Valley Forge, the Delaware crossing, Yorktown, and one very determined kid who really, really didn't volunteer for any of this.
